projects.title: Soothing Baby App
projects.description: A full-stack app to calm infants with music, GIFs, and custom uploads. Includes authentication, timers, and favorites.

projects.title: WTWR (Weather Wardrobe)
projects.description: A responsive weather-based wardrobe planner with secure auth, item ownership, and like features.

projects.title: WTWR API
projects.description: RESTful API backend for WTWR app with token-based auth, route protection, and MongoDB integration.

projects.title: Coffee Shop Landing Page
projects.description: A responsive, beautifully styled multi-section landing page with animations and scroll behavior.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.description: A full CRUD app for task management with filter, search, and drag-and-drop functionality.

projects.title: Spots Social Map
projects.description: Location-based map app for sharing and discovering cool spots. Authentication and custom markers included.
